I'm back. Hanging by a thread.
As most of you are probably aware, my inactivity was because of college and busy stuff to do in real life. Thankfully, I have enough time for now to publish some usersights.

No. 23
Description: A tank gun sight made for rapid target acquisition for fast-paced environments with cold war and modern tanks (high-top tier).

Bonus Drawing: Band logo of American Gothic Metal band Type O Negative, requested by @TypeONegat1ve

#wtdraw #itzrainyboy #sight #anime #nadia

Simplified German MBT gun sight with a range scale

This is based on the Leopard tank's gun sight. But it is optimized for War Thunder's gameplay.
The reticle would normally have a small gap in the middle, which is useful for aiming at targets that are several kilometers away. In War Thunder, however, we engage targets at very close distances. Moreover, hitting weak spots accurately is crucial. As such, I have replaced the reticle with a simple cross. It makes aiming much easier in these circumstances.
The rest of this sight's details are purely for aesthetics. They do not affect ga...

Simplified Soviet MBT gun sight with a range scale

This sight is based on T-55's gun sight, but it is optimized for War Thunder's gameplay. Those markings on the horizontal axis are purely for aesthetics. They do not affect gameplay.
Target acquisition and gun laying is quick, thanks to the long vertical center line. Aiming with the chevron is as easy as aiming with the default sight.
There is a range scale on the left-hand side, which marks the distances with 400 meter intervals(As opposed to the default sight's 200 meter intervals). As such, it is optimal to use this sight for ve...
